vote.title: Authorize a construction and maintenance agreement with Dallas, Garland and Northeastern Railroad to reconstruct the existing Nagle Street at-grade public crossing between Denton Drive and Overlake Drive as part of the Street Reconstruction Group 17-6004 - Not to exceed $195,185.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
